channel.title: Posts on Jake's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jake's Blog

item.title: gcc -wtf: Optimizing my Ray Tracer, Part I
item.description: Inspired by others at the Recurse Center, I recently built a ray tracer by working through the excellent book Ray Tracing in a Weekend. I’ve been learning C and was attracted to this project because it was complex enough to be interesting but small enough to be time-constrained (my implementation is ~1,000 lines of code); there’s minimal dependencies so I can focus on learning C instead of learning APIs; and the end result is a pretty picture:

item.title: Starting Up
item.description: I’ve never written anything on the internet before. Sure I’ve sent emails, but I’ve never had a website or blog and I don’t post on forums or social media (I’m perhaps the only former Twitter employee who has never sent a tweet). I’ve just never had much to say that hadn’t already been said. And 2024 feels like a weird time to start a blog, given how the internet works these days.
